modShortDescription: You can disassemble all types of spike traps with a wrench and have a 45% chance to get the full trap back.
modDescription:
You can disassemble all types of [spike](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-spikes/) traps with a wrench and have a 45% chance to get the full trap back.

## Changelog

Problem was you could get resources and a full trap when disassembling resulting in you getting more material than you had before. Now you will not get any resources, but have a 45% chance to get a full trap.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Robeloto/7D2D_A19_Modlets/tree/master/Robeloto_DisassembleTraps)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Robeloto/7D2D_A18.4_Modlets/tree/master/Robeloto_Disassemble%20traps)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/12229-robelotos-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Robeloto](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/robeloto/)
